name: Random Rage Romp
description: Embark on a frivolous and fruitless hunt for nothing, prove that a pair of rolling dice are better decision-makers than you. Fall into obvious traps and get your knickers in a twist or avoid the game and just give us your vote. In case you have never played a video game before the controls are (in most cases) A W D S to move and the spacebar to interact with all our wonderful surprises….vote RRR and get some sleep!
